languages.text: "Жаль, что не удалось как следует поиграть с этим многоруким чудовищем. Интересно, какова на вкус его боль".
"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, что не удалось как следует поиграть с этим многоруким чудовищем. Интересно, какова на вкус его боль".

traits.locale_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
"I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

languages.text: "Ich wünschte, ich hätte mir etwas Zeit genommen, mit dieser vielarmigen Monstrosität zu spielen. Hmm, wie ihr Schmerz wohl geschmeckt hätte?"
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wünschte, ich hätte mir etwas Zeit genommen, mit dieser vielarmigen Monstrosität zu spielen. Hmm, wie ihr Schmerz wohl geschmeckt hätte?"

languages.text: « Je regrette de ne pas avoir pris le temps de jouer un peu avec cette horreur hérissée de bras. Mmm, je me demande quel goût sa souffrance aurait laissé sur le bout de ma langue. »
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette de ne pas avoir pris le temps de jouer un peu avec cette horreur hérissée de bras. Mmm, je me demande quel goût sa souffrance aurait laissé sur le bout de ma langue. »

languages.text: «Ojalá hubiera podido jugar un poco con esa bestia de múltiples brazos. Me pregunto a qué habría sabido su dolor».
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá hubiera podido jugar un poco con esa bestia de múltiples brazos. Me pregunto a qué habría sabido su dolor».

languages.text: 「あの腕の多い怪物のようなものと、私も遊んでやればよかった。奴の痛みはどんな味がしただろうか。気になる」
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

traits.locale_text: 「あの腕の多い怪物のようなものと、私も遊んでやればよかった。奴の痛みはどんな味がしただろうか。気になる」

languages.text: “要是能花些时间，和那个长着很多手的怪物好好玩玩就好了。我真想知道它的痛苦是什么滋味。”
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

traits.locale_text: “要是能花些时间，和那个长着很多手的怪物好好玩玩就好了。我真想知道它的痛苦是什么滋味。”

languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."

languages.text: "Keşke şu çok kollu canavarla oynamaya biraz zaman ayırsaydım. Hımm, acısının tadını merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I wish I had taken some time to play with that many-armed monstrosity. Mmm, I wonder what its pain would have tasted like."
